mapper.select: SELECT id, pid, jump_type, jump_address, title, is_open, subtitle, imgsrc, price, original_price, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(begin_time) AS begin_time, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(end_time) AS end_time, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) AS now_time, store_name, activity_title, total_bid, dict_key, dict_value FROM yd_web LEFT JOIN yd_dict ON yd_web.tag_id = yd_dict.dict_id WHERE type = #{type} ORDER BY yd_web.sort, yd_web.id DESC
